basics.name: Carolina Brañas
basics.label: Social Data Scientist
basics.summary: Social Data Science MSc. graduate, deeply passionate about the field of data science and analytics, particularly interested in the use of machine learning, natural language processing and network analysis tools to find relevant solutions to big and small problems.

work.name: University of Copenhagen
work.summary: Working along a team of researchers for the project “Shocking Religion”, which examines the impact of religion on economic factors using shocks to religion as natural experiments.
highlights: Gathering large unstructured data using different methods such as web scraping or document data extraction, or by structuring existing digitized data
Analyzing data using machine learning tools (like Natural Language Processing and network analysis)
Building, debugging and improving machine learning models for prediction tasks.

work.name: Above Sports
work.summary: Supported the data team in many ad hoc tasks and performed process automation and database cleaning of sports media data.
highlights: Supported the data team in many ad hoc tasks.
Performed process automation and database cleaning of sports media data.

education.institution: University of Copenhagen, IT University of Copenhagen
courses: Advanced Machine Learning for Data Science
Intro to Java, HTML, CSS, Computer Architecture

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: The Dean's List is comprised of a select group of students who have carried at least 12 credits and achieved a grade point average of 3.5 or above during a specific semester.

awards.title: Best Graduating GPA of Marketing Bachelor
awards.summary: Best graduating GPA (3.8/4.0) of the Bachelor of Science in Marketing of the 2022 class at the time of graduation.

projects.name: Mobility and Income Segregation in Madird, Spain.
projects.summary: This study explores the relationship between income inequality and urban mobility in the city of Madrid.
